title: マチカネタンホイザ登場！

text_block_list.text: An ordinary Umamusume you might find anywhere, Matikanetannhauser.
But among her friends, she's known for having the strength to face things head-on that would make an 'ordinary' Umamusume flinch.
She herself is unaware of it... but as Director Akikawa pointed out, 'That's your greatest charm!'
Spurred on by such expectations, Matikanetannhauser is suddenly fired up!
And so began the days of aiming for victory alongside her, an 'ordinary' hard worker who's just a little bit loose.
